title: Chicken soup
description: Pure soul food, this warming, easy chicken soup makes the most of leftover roast chicken.Each serving provides 288kcal, 28g protein, 11.5g carbohydrate (of which	7g sugars), 14g fat (of which 6.5g saturates), 3.4g fibre and 0.7g salt.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
